programme.title: Ismi Solehah Ep01

programme.title: Follow Me Go! Wonders at Museums Ep01

programme.title: How To Train Your Future Ep10
programme.desc: This kids' drama depicts Xiao Shu, a model student dreaming of a bright future & who wishes he could grow up. However, he is shocked when fate connects him to his future adult self.

programme.desc: Kiki menjadi marah dan cemburu apabila seorang gadis cantik mula memberi komen di halaman IG Zali. Mereka bergaduh, dan kejadian tersebut telah dirakam oleh anak-anaknya di sosial media.

programme.title: Tok Kata Ep12
programme.desc: Merupakan sebuah program 'Game Show' yang berkonsepkan 'Tradisi'

programme.title: Layan Lockdown Ep03
programme.desc: Pelbagai gelagat dan keletah Ijat, Ryan and Amy menjalani kehidupan norma baharu serta perlu menghadapi cabaran demi kelangsungan hidup yang terjejas semasa pandemik.

programme.title: Dia Semanis Honey Ep14
programme.desc: Ahnaf ditimpa kemalangan di tempat kerja kerana rancangan Bella. Bella masih tidak putus asa memporak perandakan hidup Ahnaf.

programme.title: Berita Ke? Ep04
programme.desc: Sebuah variety show yang melakukan spoof atau satira terhadap berita-berita sebenar dan semasa dengan cara yang menghiburkan. Terdapat 2 pembaca berita yang terdiri daripada kalangan artis.

programme.title: Cam & Leon Ep11
programme.desc: Cam and Leon adalah dua ekor sesumpah yang penuh perasaan ingin tahu yang tinggal di taman bandar, jauh dari habitat semula jadi mereka.

programme.title: Putri Untuk Pangeran Ep71
programme.desc: Alex mula mengesyaki bahawa Nawang tinggal di rumah Lidia setelah mendengar perbualan mereka di telefon. Raymond mendesak Jojo untuk berlaku jujur kerana dia curiga dengan sikapnya.

programme.title: Isteri Tuan Ihsan Ep01
programme.desc: Seroja Irdina gadis 24 tahun, yang lantang bersuara. Tetapi yang pasti dia sangat nakal, manja dan keras kepala.

programme.title: Silsila Badalte Rishton Ka Ep68
programme.desc: Ketika Mauli bertanya kepada Nandini tentang keberadaannya, dia berbohong dan memberitahu bahawa dia tidak sihat. Nandini terkejut waktu sampai di rumah dan melihat darah di dinding.

programme.title: Selubung
programme.desc: Mastura yang pulang selepas tamat pengajiannya di luar negara, merasakan kehilangan rakan baiknya EJ yang telah memilih untuk mengikuti kumpulan ekstremis agama.

programme.title: Meow, the Secret Boy Ep01
programme.desc: Sol Ah mempunyai perasaan terhadap Jae Seon, tetapi dia menghilang dan meninggalkan seekor kucing. Sol Ah membawa kucing itu pulang.

programme.desc: A researcher and her crew try to link the mysterious disappearance of sailors aboard a ship to the supernatural.

programme.title: The Gatehouse

programme.title: 12:06 Rumah Kucing
programme.desc: Since his daughter brought home some stray cats, Randy and his family experience frightening phenomena in their home at midnight everyday. Things go out of hand, when their daugher is possessed.

programme.title: Indera Ke Enam
programme.desc: Since moving into the house, a woman starts experiencing strange visions. No one believes her at first, until her daughter's friend starts to investigate the history of the house.

programme.title: Still
programme.desc: Featuring the vengeful spirits of those who suffer prematurely cruel deaths, Still describes four gruesome deadlines.

programme.title: Gasing Tengkorak
programme.desc: A singer falls ills and retreats to a beautiful, secluded villa to recuperate. But she soon gets drawn into a mysterious, supernatural game where her fate lies with a spinning top.

programme.title: Heaven & Hell
programme.desc: Fans of 'found-footage' horror should not miss these three short tales made up of images from surveillance cameras set up in a creepy mansion, a convenience store and finally, in a broken lift.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: A disturbed father locks his seven-year-old daughter in his house, warning her of the dangers outside until a mysterious Mr. Snowcone convinces her to join him on his quest for freedom and revenge.

programme.title: Haunting Of The Mary Celeste
programme.desc: A researcher and her crew try to link the mysterious disappearance of sailors aboard a ship to the supernatural.

programme.title: Telaga Angker
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is killed when she drives her car into a lake. But soon her spirit returns to exact revenge on those who had caused her death.

programme.title: The Gatehouse
programme.desc: Eternity lives with her writer father in a gatehouse near the woods. She loves digging for buried treasure around her home. One day, she finds something she shouldn't have. Now, the forest wants it back.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: A woman, whose brother died recently, believes she can communicate with spirits. Soon, she starts getting mysterious text messages.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: The crew of a horror web series travel to an abandoned asylum for a live broadcast. They soon encounter much more than expected as they move deeper inside the nightmarish old building.

programme.title: Perng Mang The Haunted Drum
programme.desc: A music student comes into contact with a cursed drum and its attendant spirit. He learns to play it, not knowing that the drum is a dangerous instrument that can kill.

programme.title: Lampor : Keranda Terbang
programme.desc: Upon the arrival of Netta and her family to her hometown in Temanggung, a demon named Lampor comes alive begins to attacks her children as Edwin begins to suspect that she hides a secret from him.

programme.title: M4M4
programme.desc: Grieving mother Aini seeks revenge on the troublemakers in her neighbourhood who caused her 15-year-old daughter's death.

programme.title: The Debutantes
programme.desc: Kate is a misfit but also a math whiz, which attracts the attention of one of the mean girls in school. Kate is invited to a birthday party, where the mean girls prank her. Soon, the girls start to die.

programme.title: Check-in Shock
programme.desc: The film Check-in Shock is the basis for the story of the reality game show, Check-in Shock. With a focus on hate and malice, contestants step into the realm of curses and feuding evil spirits.

programme.desc: A music student comes into contact with a cursed drum and its attendant spirit. He learns to play it, not knowing that the drum is a dangerous instrument that can kill.

programme.title: Blok 404
programme.desc: Horror and romance collide at a guesthouse, where various incidents come to a head on a very eventful BBQ night.

programme.title: Memoir

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese
programme.desc: This 1972 cult classic stars Lily Ho in her most audacious role as a mysterious courtesan caught in a web of sex and murder with her powerful madam.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Two women and a man have to deal with forgery, fire and poisoned needles when they go up against a notorious gang.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: Cheng Pei-pei turns human combine harvester as she hacks a path through life, avenging the death of her family under the moniker 'The Jade Raksha'.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: This hard-hitting drama is based on a real-life investigation on the involvement of both cops as well as crooks in second offences.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This sequel depicts how the brothers of the Water Margin embark on a hunt for the thieves. Will they succeed and if so, at what cost?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: One of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screen, this classic stars the husband-and-wife team of Peter Chen and Betty Loh.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: A traitorous clansman bids to locate and then unleash the deadly 'Five Venom Spider' against those who bid to stand in his way.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: Vengeance Is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: In this tale of greed, lust and vengeance, only Silver Swallow can stop the golden blade.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Lauded as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals of the 60s, this award-winning piece starring Linda Lin Dai as a dancer who finds romance with her boss's son.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: A waitress, who is secretly the outlaw Black Butterfly, steals from the rich and gives to the poor but picking the wrong targets sets the law on her heels.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: This classic romance stars Linda Lin and Kwan Shan, capturing a touching love story between a famous nightclub singer and a young architect.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel Water Margin and starring Ti Lung, this award-winning drama depicts how the courageous Wu Song defeats a tiger, and his bond with Wu Da Lang.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: Director Chan Friend joins award-winning social satirist Alfred Cheung Kin Ting in this delightful variation on the hugely successful British Carry On!

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A martial artist joins the police force in order to pursue the man who killed his best friend but it is only years later that he discovers a startling clue.

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: This tale of the 100 Poison Clique's obsessive ambition to destroy all rivals climaxes in a bloody clash involving a mass murderer's trial.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: The chase may be long, but the action is fast and furious, in this tale of a dart master-for-hire and the innkeeper's daughter who loves him.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: In true Huangmei opera style, lovely Li Hsiang-chun stars as a used and abused beauty in director Kao Li's restrained, as well as sadistic tearjerker.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In this comedic sequel to the 36th Chamber of Shaolin, Gordon Liu is hired to impersonate the 36th Chamber's founder!

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Follow a virtuous viper as it sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a dangerous lady in this thriller!

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Cheng Pei-pei, swordswoman extraordinaire, teams with Lo Lieh in this fast-paced 'Martial Arts World' adventure, a quest for the legendary 'Jade Dragon Sword.'

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: After a compulsive gambler's wife leaves him, he gets offered a beautiful ghost as his new wife.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: Loyal to the emperor, the protagonist attempts to stop the delivery of a message depicted across twelve gold medallions that is to be delivered by traitors.

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: In this chapter of the 'Journey to the West' saga, the Monkey King and his gang are confronted by a whole host of fanciful villains.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: Action king, David Chiang plays Wei Feng, who is sent to investigate the suspicious Tien family. However, he never expects to fall for the beautiful Chi.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: A woman sets up a troubled love triangle involving 2 swordsmen (Ti Lung and Lau Wing) and an enchanting lady (Ching Li).

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: When deadbeats Ming and Liang stumble upon records of scandals involving government officials, what follows is a humorous misadventure of epic proportions.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: A man who was wrongly convicted 20 years ago becomes the prime suspect in the murder of the abusive father of a young pianist. Has the victim turned into a killer?

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: Xi Wen is getting married! Throwing her a wild bachelorette party in Vietnam are Xi Wen's best friends, Kimmy & the glamourous Jia Lan. Will it be the awesome night they imagine?

programme.title: Line Walker
programme.desc: Nominated as New Director in 2017 HKFA, Sharmaine Sheh is back with newly joint Nicky Cheung, Louis Koo and Francis Ng in the search for the 6th undercover!

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: Starring Zhou Dong Yu & Joseph Chang, this comedy depicts a young man falling in love with a girl who only eats nail clippers!

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Starring Huang Xuan & Liu Hao Ran, this winner of five awards tells the legend of a demon cat who disrupts the peace during the Tang Dynasty, causing a series of strange events.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Wah and Fly are cousins and best buddies but Wah is hesitant to maintain their relationship as he is involved with the mob. Then, Fly offended a mob boss one day, forcing Wah to interfere.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A young family anticipates much joy when they move to a harmonious new neighbourhood. However, they are soon to find that things only look perfect on the surface.

programme.title: Xiao Ming & His Buddies
programme.desc: This heart-warming comedy will have you shedding tears of laughter. While burglarizing a bungalow, Liu Bei and his gang of dim-witted thieves meet their match in little Xiao Ming and his friends.

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, starring Kathy Yuen & Daichi Harashima. Two young astrology enthusiasts meet under the starry night during a massive power outage in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: Killer Limo
programme.desc: Full of sword fights and action-packed sequences, catch this exciting crime-action about a young woman who seeks revenge against criminal organizations who killed his father in Thailand.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Tong Da Wei & Ma Li star in the comedy of the year, in which seven friends share all messages & calls on their cell phones in a party game. Expectedly, secrets are revealed in the most hilarious way!

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: A violent shootout between the police and a group of gangsters 20 years ago sparks another bloodbath involving the surviving team members.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: Duo Yu, a goalkeeper for a hopeless football team, is made an offer by his rich uncle - to be made heir to his vast fortune, but only if he can spend one billion yuan (US$144 million) in a month.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Disgraced by a lady fighter named Chun, the Grandmaster Fei Lung's unexpected romantic feelings towards her threatens to derail his win in the final fight he has challenged her to.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Hung Jen, struggling actor meets Hui Hsin, an associate producer who must write a script for a love story. He invites her out on a date as a research for her script and soon falls in love.

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: Two Kung Fu kings - Sammo Hung & Vincent Zhao, collaborate for the first time, portraying a maverick commander and a young general who join forces to battle pirates in 16th-century China.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Yin Tze Long agrees to lead a pilot program training 3 underperforming school choirs to participate in an inter-school choral competition.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: An affluent young man decides to carry on his father's legacy by establishing the Mr McDreamy Training Academy with four suitable recruits - to hilarious results.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Nick Cheung wrote and directed this Hong Kong crime thriller about a prolific and accomplished undercover cop who has no qualms in risking his life to take down the leader of a mysterious criminal group.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: Yu Feng & Liang Liang's puppy is gravely injured while defending them from their neighbour's aggressive dog but sadly, the neighbour refuses to take responsibility.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: Throw down
programme.desc: Johnnie To pays homage to his idol Akira Kurosawa in this all-star story of a former Judo champion who receives a second chance.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: By night, a blind attorney turns into a powerful, masked vigilante with a 'radar sense' that allows him to 'see' with superhuman capabilities.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: A couple proves that true love is strong enough to withstand the brutal tests of memory and time.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: When a successful executive suffers a crisis of confidence and his career is at stake, he finds the solution to his problems in his daughter's imaginary world.

programme.title: Ordinary Love
programme.desc: Joan and Tom are an everyday couple with a remarkable love. When Joan is diagnosed with breast cancer, they must find the humor and grace to survive a year of adversity.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: When four outsiders saw the collapse of the economy, they had an idea that leads them into the dark underbelly of modern banking questioning everyone and everything.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: The lives of two families from across the social divide become fatefully intertwined following an impulsive business deal and a tragic hit-and-run accident.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep04
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: High school students conspire to steal the answers to the SAT but realize that true happiness does not stem from a perfect score.

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: A family of three fights for survival as a planet-destroying comet hurtles towards Earth. They make a perilous journey to their only hope for survival.

programme.title: Superintelligence
programme.desc: As artificial intelligence decides whether to enslave, save or destroy humanity, Carol, the most average person on Earth, must prove people are worth saving.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An epic action-adventure with a breathtaking new vision of the legendary tale of Snow White.

programme.title: Succession S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season 2, Logan Roy begins Season 3 in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances.

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: A pilot miraculously lands his plane after a catastrophe, but gets questioned about the cause of it all.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: A courier's work is interrupted when she discovers that one of the packages is a bomb that is aimed at the only witness who is able to testify against the ruthless crime lord.

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: Trained from childhood in the way of the Ozunu Clan, deadly assassin Raizo is stalked by fellow warriors for breaking free of them and their patriarch.

programme.title: Kajillionaire
programme.desc: During a hastily conceived heist, a family of con-artists charm a stranger into joining their next scam, only to have their entire world turned upside down.

programme.title: Radioactive
programme.desc: Radioactive is the incredible, true story of Marie Curie, a fiercely passionate scientist, who struggles to progress her ground-breaking research, despite her obvious brilliance.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Finding himself wanted by the FBI and the mob, a streetwise boy enlists the help of a lawyer to help him navigate the sea of single-minded prosecutors and protect him from the mobsters' reprisals.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: BIRDMAN tells the story of an actor famous for portraying an iconic superhero as he struggles to mount a Broadway play.

programme.title: Superintelligence
programme.desc: As artificial intelligence decides whether to enslave, save or destroy humanity, Carol, the most average person on Earth, must prove people are worth saving.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: When a young child falsely accuses a man of a crime he did not commit, it sets off a chain of events that alter the lives of her loved ones forever.

programme.title: The Sun Is Also a Star
programme.desc: A pragmatic woman from Jamaica falls in love with an equivocal medical student under atypical circumstances, fighting obstacles challenging their love along the way.

programme.title: E.T.
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic tells the story of how a little boy tries to help a stranded alien return home when it is accidentally left stranded on Earth.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The quest for perfection drives two magicians to the very edge of sanity and morality.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: A courier's work is interrupted when she discovers that one of the packages is a bomb that is aimed at the only witness who is able to testify against the ruthless crime lord.

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: As team leader, O'Hara leads a squad of soldiers to rescue hostages in remote Africa. The mission goes awry when they face a brutal encounter with a gang of rebels and a horde of enraged lions.

programme.title: House Hunters S119 Ep05
programme.desc: A world traveler wants to set down roots in her hometown of Charleston, South Carolina.

programme.title: House Hunters International S105 Ep02
programme.desc: The lure of Portugal's golden visa brings a couple from Dubai to Lisbon.

programme.title: House Hunters S119 Ep06
programme.desc: A single mom wants a permanent home for her three kids in the Detroit suburbs.

programme.title: House Hunters International S100 Ep12
programme.desc: A couple escapes the Texas heat with a move to cool Colchester, England.

programme.title: House Hunters S119 Ep07
programme.desc: A competitive couple disagrees over their first home in Atlanta.

programme.title: House Hunters International S105 Ep03
programme.desc: An American entrepreneur takes charge of her future in Vietri sul Mare, Italy.

programme.title: House Hunters S119 Ep08
programme.desc: A young buyer in Philly is hoping to buy an old row house, but her mom wants her in a high rise.

programme.title: House Hunters Renovation S12 Ep01
programme.desc: A Southern California family finds a house large enough to accommodate their growing needs after a few renovations.

programme.title: Restored by the Fords S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Returning clients ask the Fords to work on the rest of the rooms in their midcentury modern home.

programme.title: Restored by the Fords S1 Ep06

programme.desc: When Nonny, Gil and Zooli conjure a genie, she agrees to grant whoever brings her the most precious gift a wish. They think it might be a precious gem, but turns out it's friendship!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. They get caught in a very long traffic jam so Grandpa Pig decides to bring lunch to them. There's enough for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They find many things. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it's home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta.We identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel and Pail.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep409
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of 'grow spice' onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep410
programme.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Corny escapes from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups must light their way home! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a mine car! Ryder and the Pups must rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Daring Danny X does a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch but the wind flips him over! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger makes Rocky Kitty steal a pie from Mr. Porter's to join.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep104
programme.desc: When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest!

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep107
programme.desc: A thunderstorm means Calvin has to practice soccer indoors. With ROBO G's help, he builds a practice wall. But can it withstand the storm's rumble, or must he use his PLAY POWER to make it super strong?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Calvin's very own 'Hair Fixing Lab' accidentally creates a hairball monster that runs rampage in the kid cave! Can Calvin use his PLAY POWER to get himself out of this hairy situation?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen and buried it! // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that they will be hungry, so Granny Pig helps.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Peppa and friends make a time capsule. They each put a favourite thing inside and bury it in the school garden. They discover that their parents made a time capsule years ago and now it's time to open it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a green box to be recycled. Old newspapers and tins go into other boxes. They have fun filling them!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is drawing shapes, and Daddy Pig's job is complicated.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep503
programme.desc: It's Secret Agent Nonny's birthday, and he's on a mission to deliver mysterious messages to all of his agent friends. Turns out, they're invitations to his own surprise birthday party!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep214
programme.desc: It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day and Blue is making something for you! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what she is making, help Slippery with his Love Day Cards and cheer our Heart Friends up.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go and also make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep519
programme.desc: Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep103
programme.desc: A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Francois and Cap'n Turbot get stranded on an island,Ryder and the pups fly in to rescue them.//It's a mid air rescue as Mayor Goodway's first flying lesson goes awry, the Pups ensure everyone is safe.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep125
programme.desc: It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat from Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a metal detector. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Elly & Epit Terbaik!
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat dan telatah Elly, Epit, Kobi serta Abang Johan menceritakan pengalaman mereka dalam drama bersiri Elly & Epit yang pasti mencuit hati.

programme.title: Elly & Epit 2013 Telemovie
programme.desc: Uncle Johari menerima tawaran sebagai Cupcake Chef daripada Hotel 5 Bintang di Australia. Isterinya menghadapi tekanan ketiadaan Uncle Jo. Nabilo datang memberikan bantuan. Jom Saksikannya.

programme.desc: Jangan lepaskan peluang menyaksikan diari juara Kamilah Bintang, Wani. Saksikan sesi rakaman album, temubual, muzik video dan pelbagai lagi aktiviti yang menarik untuk peminat Wani.
